name: Alien Forest
description:
"If you're looking for a simple game where you can just relax and have fun and enjoy the art design, this is the game for you." - Bandsmen GAMES

Welcome to Alien Forest

  • Walk, run, and explore a small forest area!
  • Discover the relics of previous inhabitants and those that once visited.
  • Listen to the tranquil sounds of the wind through the forest.
  • Follow the objective or just relax in the serene space.

Playtime: 5 - 10 minutes

This is my first 3D game where I modeled and textured everything you see!

Game made in Unity Engine

Models made in Blender
